intro: Asterotrichion, commonly known as the common asterotrichion, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its composite flower heads, which consist of both ray and disk flowers. The plant typically grows in open, disturbed habitats such as roadsides and fields. It has narrow, linear leaves and produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are often overlooked. Asterotrichion is known for its adaptability and is found in various regions across Europe and Asia.
